para: PixelInfoDisplay highlights the µ or ℑ pixel currently being investigated by the PixelInfo toolbox in the Graphics Window by drawing a box around the pixel. The line_width parameter is in units of the screen pixel size (which is not necessarily the same as the ℑ pixel size!).

A single PixelInfoDisplay is created automatically in each Graphics Window and is not normally visible in the window's layer list. To edit its properties, first select List All Layers in the graphics window's Settings menu.
